"A.P.242/2/26/16:10": "Is that all? Surely the Guardian who displayed such fearsome bravery in Omega should be capable of more."
"...So we really are enemies."
"Why did you do what you did in Omega?"
"Whatever do you mean. Have I not stated that this was all for my liege?"
"I have already told you. It is all for the sake of my liege."
"Everything I have done has been for the sole purpose of returning my liege to this world."
"Concealing myself in Omega, playing the role of dutiful knight, fighting alongside you, saving the world... Welcoming in my liege."
"...And finally, fulfilling her wish to destroy this world."
"That is her purpose... That is the purpose of Varuna, God of Fidelity."
"God of Fidelity..."
"Mitra and I owe our existence to our liege, and we are likewise required of her."
"All else is unnecessary. All within this realm is unnecessary."
"How long will you continue this pointless fighting? There is no meaning in delaying the inevitable."
"Why you...!"
"If you wish to keep me here, then I shall entertain you as long as you like... That was always my intention, after all."
"...It can't be!"
"Hurry!"
"Do you think I will let you go?"
"...You will not interfere!"
"Go!"
